long_description: From kayaking to boogie boarding to swamp wading, the women's Ahnu Delta Water Shoes protect your feet from sharp rocks and give you grip on wet surfaces without weighing you down. QuiteLight(R) construction principles throughout the shoes center on superior comfort and materials with exceptional strength-to-weight ratios. Low in profile, highly flexible and well ventilated, the polyurethane mesh uppers hug your feet; neoprenelike heel wraps keep them securely in place. Slight toe and heel bumpers protect your feet from river rocks or other bumps and abrasions. Removable, perforated EVA footbeds add cushion underfoot and drain easily. Nonmarking rubber outsoles with flex grooves grip wet and dry surfaces well; spider rubber compound in the center pods improve traction on slick surfaces.
short_description: From kayaking to boogie boarding to swamp wading, the women's Ahnu Delta Water Shoes protect your feet from sharp rocks and give you grip on wet surfaces without weighing you down.
